attributes.action: Follow the lead of Australia in the restrictions and treatment of persons who come here to live or work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People choosing our country as a place of safety or to live in for any other reason should be in no doubt that they are the ones who need to adapt and that if they are not prepared to do this they should be reminded of their right to leave and assisted to this end.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
